EmailTemplate.name: 202103_DSS_Application_Email.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Advanced Notice - New Mobile Applications Versions Coming March 30
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Honeywell Customers,
We’re committed to helping our customers/partners maintain the security of our products and their aircraft and frequently provide software updates for existing, fielded products to keep pace with current technological advances. We will be rolling out a new version of our mobile applications starting on Monday, March 29 at 11:59 p.m. PDT / Tuesday, March 30 at 7:59 a.m. UTC.
After this date, the following versions of the mobile applications will be taken offline.
Mobile Application
Discontinued Version
IDM
iOS v4.0.6 – v4.0.5
IDM
Windows v4.0.7 – v4.0.0
Data Manager
Windows v4.7.0 or earlier
OneNav+
Windows v2.9.0 or earlier
MxAdvisor
iOS v1.1.0 or earlier
After Monday, March 29, if you are using any of the applications referenced above, you will be required to update to a version listed in the table below.
Mobile Application
Versions Supported
Release Date
Location of Software
IDM
iOS v1.7
Current
Apple Store
IDM / JDM
Windows v3.4.5.4
Current
https://inds.epicinds.com/epic/login <[[https://inds.epicinds.com/epic/login]]>
IDM
iOS v4.0.8
March 30, 2021
Apple Store
IDM
Windows v4.0.8
April 2, 2021
https://inds.epicinds.com/epic/login <[[https://inds.epicinds.com/epic/login]]>
Data Manager
Windows v4.8.0
April 8, 2021
https://ads.honeywell.com <[[https://ads.honeywell.com]]>
OneNav+
Windows v2.10.0
April 9, 2021
https://ads.honeywell.com <[[https://ads.honeywell.com]]>
MxAdvisor
iOS v1.2.0
April 9 2021
Apple Store
Note: These applications may be released sooner than the dates above however they will not have full functionality until Tuesday, March 30.
While this should be a straightforward update, it may cause temporary disruptions for some customers. We’re committed to limiting and mitigating any issues. We’re letting you know now so you have time to prepare and we’ll also provide you with a standard email notification that you can use to let your people and network know about the change.
If you have any questions, please let a INDS/Honeywell contact know. As always, thank you for your business. FAQs will be provided at the following link: https://ads.honeywell.com <[[https://ads.honeywell.com]]>.
Sincerely,
Honeywell Team
fsstechsupport@honeywell.com <[[mailto:fsstechsupport@honeywell.com]]> 1-800-601-3099 602-365-3099 Option 2 then option 1
